author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Cesca Therapeutics Reports Q1 Loss Per Share $0.27
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Cesca Therapeutics Inc:
* CESCA THERAPEUTICS ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS AND PROVIDES CORPORATE UPDATE
* Q1 LOSS PER SHARE $0.27 * Q1 REVENUE $1.9 MILLION VERSUS $3.3 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
